name: Market Data engineer (trade platforms technical support)
description:
Our Vision and Mission

VTB Capital’s goal is to be Russia’s Investment Banking powerhouse. We want to be the firm that is a natural choice for all Russian Investment banking and asset management products. A choice our clients around the world make routinely and with confidence.

Our mission is to exceed client expectations by providing first class financial services. To create value for the benefit of our clients and for economic and social progress globally.

VTB Capital is an international investment leader with profound expertise in the Russian financial products and the Russian market.

Building a strong international presence and creating value for our local clients and communities is very important to us. We respect our business partners and adhere to the principles of social responsibility in every market in which we operate.

We combine our product expertise and international presence with a focus on long-term relationships and trust in order to generate superior returns for all our stakeholders.

The Position

Market Data is unit within Information Technology Operations, dedicated to provide support coverage for Market Data systems and services for VTBC employees globally.

The role is closely interact with business and support divisions, to deliver timely and qualitative technical support service for Market Data information delivery, trading platforms management, technical issues troubleshooting, participation in Market Data related projects.

Principal Accountabilities

Market Data engineer is responsible for:

  • Availability and workability of technical part of Market Data systems in VTBC;
  • Market Data administrative tasks (access control, user management, permissions management);
  • External Market Data trade platforms administration and troubleshooting;
  • Market Data vendors communication on technical topics;
  • Delivering high level of technical support to end users of Market Data systems (2nd line)
  • Continuous improvement of technical side of Market Data systems;
  • Market Data trade platforms regular access recertification;
  • Participating in Market Data projects (in cooperation with other IT teams);
  • Knowledge documenting and sharing it with other team members.

Key Competencies & Qualifications

  • Experience in investment bank IT;
  • Fluent English;
  • Knowledge of Financial markets workflow;
  • Knowledge technical side of main Refinitiv products: DACS, EMS, TREP-RT, DataScope Select, Deal Tracker, FXT, Eikon;
  • Knowledge technical side of main Bloomberg products and services: BDL, B-Pipe, TOMS (ETOMS), IOI (Trade Adverts), FXGO, TradeBook, EMSX, Bloomberg terminal;
  • Knowledge of main MOEX / NSD products and services: MOEX client-bank, TEAP server, FORTS, Luch, MOEX trade reports;
  • Knowledge technical side of main external Market Data trade services: Market Axess, Broker trading platforms, Markit;
  • Understanding principles of FIX feeds functionality;
  • Basic network skills;
  • Basic Windows server / Unix skills;
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills;
  • Good teamwork skills
  • Ability to work overtime;
  • Ability to work under pressure.

Benefit package

  • Official employment
  • Competitive salary
  • Professional training and development
  • Voluntary medical insurance for employee and their family members, life and health insurance, banking products on attractive terms
  • Sport and corporate events
  • Ability to build your career in the leading Russian investment bank
